So you want to be woke on
Racism.

Understanding Racism


What is Racism?

Racism is one’s benefiting from a system of privileges based on race that are subtly ingrained in the surrounding culture, making it difficult to detect. In this sense, all white people are racist; we benefit from this system of privileges.

Definition Source
